last_episode_to_air.name: The Anaconda's Lair
last_episode_to_air.overview: Forrest's goal is to end conflicts between humans and wildlife and to solve the riddles behind local legends and mysteries before these animals become extinct.

name: Mysterious Creatures with Forrest Galante
overview: Wildlife biologist Forrest Galante has spent his life tracking and rediscovering animals 'lost' to extinction, from his historic rediscovery of the Fernandina Tortoise to the elusive Dracula monkey and more. Now, in an all-new series, Forrest, along with his wife and zoologist, Jessica Summerfield, travel across the globe from Mozambique to the Pacific Northwest, to investigate reports of 'strange sightings,' 'legendary creatures' and 'mysterious encounters' between humans and wildlife that may not only lead to conflict but may further lead to that animal extinction behind the local lore. Forrest's goal is to end the conflict and to solve the riddles behind the local legends and mysteries before these animals truly become 'mythological' due to extinction.

episodes.name: Croc Witchcraft
episodes.overview: Rumors of witchcraft bring Forrest to Africa's Zambezi River, the site of crocodile attacks plaguing a local fishing village; he and his childhood friend are determined to stop the killings and save the croc before things turn even more deadly.

episodes.name: The Ozark Howler
episodes.overview: Forrest travels to Missouri with zoologist and wife Jessica to meet a man who claims he witnessed a wolf-like creature with a strange howl and distinct odor; a chance encounter with a local moonshiner leads them to an amazing discovery.

episodes.name: The Lake Chelan Dragon
episodes.overview: Forrest travels to the Pacific Northwest with zoologist and wife Jessica on a mission to uncover the truth about the centuries-old myth of the lake monster; a deep dive into Lake Chelan reveals scales from what could be the real-life legend.

episodes.name: The Demon of Peru
episodes.overview: Forrest and his wife, Jessica, are in Peru, where a local farming village is being terrorized by what they believe is a man-like beast from Peruvian folklore; evidence leads the team deep into the Andes to find the source of these terrifying attacks.

episodes.name: It Comes in the Night
episodes.overview: Forrest is in Mozambique to track down a bull elephant that has been destroying local villages. When he discovers not one, but an entire herd of elephants, the investigation leads to one of the biggest and most challenging animal rescues he has ever done.

episodes.name: The Anaconda's Lair
episodes.overview: Forrest's goal is to end conflicts between humans and wildlife and to solve the riddles behind local legends and mysteries before these animals become extinct.
